errors.passwordUpdateFailed: Password update failed. Make sure you entered your current password and that it is correct.

languageSettings.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface. This setting is stored locally in your browser.
languageSettings.title: Language Preferences

account.profileChangesNotAllowedInDemo: Profile changes are not allowed in demo mode

profileSettings.description: Manage your personal information and account details.
profileSettings.title: Profile Information

security.description: Update your password to keep your account secure. Use a strong password with at least 8 characters, including uppercase letters and numbers.

settings.description: Manage your personal information and account details. Your email address can only be changed if you are using the internal authentication provider.
settings.title: Account Settings

account.title: Account

auth.chooseMethod: Choose your preferred login method below
auth.enterEmailAndPassword: Enter your email and password to access your account

accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to sign in. Please contact your administrator.
accessDenied.title: Access Denied

errors.callback: Authentication callback failed. Please try again.

configuration.message: There is a problem with the server configuration. Please contact your administrator.
configuration.title: Configuration Error

credentials.message: The credentials you provided are incorrect. Please try again.
credentials.title: Sign In Failed

default.message: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again.
default.title: Authentication Error

email.message: Could not send sign-in email. Please try again later.
email.title: Email Error

errors.fetchProfileFailed: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

oauth.message: An error occurred during OAuth authentication. Please try again or use a different sign-in method.
oauth.title: OAuth Error

errors.persistentIssue: If this issue persists, please contact your administrator.

unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred during authentication.
unknown.title: Authentication Error

verification.message: The verification token has expired or has already been used. Please try signing in again.
verification.title: Verification Failed

errors.wrongPasswordOrEmail: Wrong password or email. Please try again.

auth.fillDetailsToStart: Please fill in your details to get started
auth.getStartedFree: Get started with open source time tracking
auth.needHelp: Need help? Click the help button

sessionExpired.alert: Your session has timed out for security reasons.
sessionExpired.message: Please log in again to continue using the application.
sessionExpired.title: Session Expired

status.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please log in again.

auth.tagline: Open source time tracking for modern teams
auth.thankYouForRegistering: Thank you for registering! You can now log in using your email address and password. Welcome to Lasius!

actions.adjustCurrentStart: Adjust current booking to start at overlapping booking end
actions.adjustLowerEnd: Extend lower booking end to upper booking start
actions.adjustOverlappingEnd: Adjust overlapping booking to end at current booking start
actions.adjustUpperStart: Move upper booking start to lower booking end

bookings.emptyNeverHelp: Get started by creating your first booking. Need guidance?

hints.useEndTimeOfLatest: Use end time of latest booking as start time for this one
hints.useEndTimeOfPrevious: Use end time of previous booking as start time for this one
hints.useStartTimeOfNext: Use start time of next booking as end time for this one

history.empty: No bookings found for the selected filters

bookings.overlapsWarning: These bookings overlap. Click to edit and adjust the time.
bookings.title: Bookings

common.confirmUnsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to cancel?

errors.helpNotAvailable: Help content not available for this page.

info.helpFallbackLanguage: This help content is not available in your selected language yet. Showing English version.

validation.endBeforeStart: End time is before start time

demo.welcome: Welcome to the Lasius demo instance. Use "demo1@lasius.ch" and password "demo" to log in and have a look around. The demo instance is reset once a day.

errors.dataFetchFailed: So sorry, but the data could not be retrieved due to an error.

footer.developedBy: Developed by <0>Tegonal</0>, available on <1>GitHub</1>, released under <2>AGPL 3.0</2>
footer.feedbackOnGithub: We appreciate your feedback. Please leave a comment on <0>GitHub</0>

invitations.createAccountMessage: You've been invited to create a Lasius account to track your working hours.

description.copyLink: Copy the link and send it to your colleague. If they do not have an account yet, one will be created when the invitation is accepted.

errors.createdForSomeoneElse: This invitation has been created for someone else. Either log out and refresh, or forward the invitation link to the user {{email}}
errors.noLongerValid: This invitation is no longer valid. It is best to contact the person who sent you the invitation link to get a new one.

invitations.inviteOrganisationDescription: Enter the email address of the person you want to invite. An invitation link will be generated that you can send to them.
invitations.inviteProjectDescription: Enter the email address of the person you want to invite. An invitation link will be generated that you can send to them.

messages.invitedToOrganisation: You have been invited by {{inviter}} to join organisation {{organisation}}.
messages.invitedToProject: You have been invited by {{inviter}} to join project {{project}}.
messages.selectOrganisation: Select the organisation you would like to add this project to:

confirmations.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}?
confirmations.removeWarning: This member will be removed from the organisation and lose access to all projects.

offline.message: You are offline. This application requires an online connection. It will update automatically when a network connection is detected.

booking.step1Desc: Find the booking form in the right column and select a project.
booking.step2Desc: Right-click any booking, favorite, or team booking and choose the stopwatch icon.
booking.step3Desc: When you finish working, stop the timer.
booking.subtitle: You're all set! Here's how to create your first booking.
booking.title: Start Tracking Time

checklist.help: Click on any item to learn more about it
checklist.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to start tracking time
checklist.title: Let's Get You Started
checklist.workingHours: Set working hours for this organization

onboarding.confirmClose: Are you sure you want to close the tutorial? You can re-enable it in App Settings.

navigation.organisationDesc: Manage your current organization, create new organizations and view organization-wide data
navigation.orgSwitcherDesc: In the top-right corner, switch between your organizations
navigation.settingsDesc: Configure app settings, account, security and working hours
navigation.subtitle: Here are the main parts of Lasius you will use every day.
navigation.title: Getting Around Lasius
navigation.userDesc: Track your time, view your bookings, dashboard, projects, statistics and lists
navigation.weeklyCalendarDesc: At the top of the page, switch between days to view your bookings

organisation.step1Desc: Go to Organization settings and create a new organization to invite others.
organisation.step2Desc: Ask someone to invite you and wait for them to send you an invite link.
organisation.subtitle: Organizations let you work with team members and track time together.
organisation.title: Create or Join an Organization

overview.exportsDesc: Find your reports in the Lists section
overview.help: Click 'Next' to see what you need to set up
overview.subtitle: Here are the basic building blocks you should know about
overview.tagsDesc: Categorize your bookings for detailed reports
overview.title: Welcome to Lasius
overview.workingHoursDesc: Track your planned work hours per week

privateOrganisation.explanation: Your private organization is perfect for tracking personal projects and anything you don't need to share with others. Only you can see the projects and time tracked here.
privateOrganisation.subtitle: You already have a private organization for personal use.
privateOrganisation.tipDesc: If you want to work with team members, you can create or join additional organizations.
privateOrganisation.title: Your Private Organization

projects.step1Desc: Go to My Projects and create a new project.
projects.step2Desc: Ask an administrator to add you to their project.
projects.subtitle: Projects help you organize your time. You need at least one to get started.
projects.title: Create or Join a Project

workingHours.step1Desc: Click the button below to set your hours.
workingHours.step2Desc: Set how many hours you work each day. Lasius will show your progress.
workingHours.subtitle: Tell Lasius how many hours per week you plan to work.
workingHours.title: Set Working Hours

organisations.adminDescription: You are an administrator of this organisation. You can add and remove members and change the organisation name, or create a new one.
organisations.createDescription: Use the Actions menu to create a new organisation.

description.create: Create a new organisation to collaborate with your team.

errors.duplicateKey: An organisation with this name already exists

organisations.memberDescription: You are a member of this organisation and don't have the rights to add or remove members. Get in touch with an organisation administrator if you would like to invite someone.
organisations.privateDescription: This organisation is only visible to you. Use it to track private projects. To collaborate with others, create or use a different organisation.
organisations.title: Organisations

projects.allProjectsDescription: All projects in the current organisation that you can administer. Create billing reports including time booked by external project members.

confirmations.deactivate: Are you sure you want to deactivate this project?
confirmations.deactivateInstructions: To confirm, please type the project name below:
confirmations.deactivateWarning: This action cannot be undone. The project will be permanently archived and all user assignments will be removed. You will not be able to reactivate this project.
confirmations.leave: Are you sure you want to leave this project?

description.add: Create a new project to organize your time tracking.

errors.duplicateKey: A project with this name already exists
errors.projectNotFound: This project could not be found. The project ID is shown above.

info.uniqueNameRequired: Project names must be unique within your organisation.

projects.label: Project
projects.myProjectsDescription: Projects where you are a member and can book time, filtered by the current organisation.
projects.name: Project name
projects.title: Projects

warnings.projectNotInActiveList: This project is not in your active projects list. It may be inactive or from another organization.
warnings.projectUnavailable: This project is no longer in your profile. You may have been removed from it.

pwa.updateMessage: Lasius has been updated. The page will reload after your confirmation.

app.description: Customize your experience with language and theme preferences. These settings are stored locally in your browser.
app.title: Application Settings

stats.empty: No data available for the selected period

system.noInternetConnection: No Internet connection. Please make sure that your device is connected to the Internet.
system.offlineMessage: Lasius is currently offline or undergoing maintenance. We will be back shortly.

tags.confirmDeleteGroup: Are you sure you want to delete the tag group "{{groupName}}"?
tags.enterToAdd: Enter a tag to add it
tags.label: Tags
tags.simpleTagsDescription: Tags that are not part of any group
tags.title: Tags

tos.acceptMessage: Please accept the following Terms of Service (version {{version}}), if you want to continue using Lasius:
tos.title: Terms of Service (version {{version}})

errors.userNotFound: This user could not be found. The user ID is shown above.

warnings.userNotInActiveList: This user is not in your active users list. They may have been removed from the organisation.
warnings.userUnavailable: This user is no longer available in your organisation.

validation.startMustBeInPast: Start time must be in the past

workHealth.relaxReminder: Time to relax a little bit

workingHours.clickToAdjustHours: Click any day below to adjust working hours
workingHours.description: The amount of time you expect to book per day, by organisation, during a typical working week. This data is used to calculate your daily and weekly progress.
workingHours.setHoursDescription: Set your working hours for each day
workingHours.title: Working hours
